text: Wargamer Available in English Owner Network N Created by Mario Kroll Editor Alex Evans URL wargamer.com Registration Optional Launched September 1995; 28 years ago (September 1995) Current status Active Wargamer (originally The Wargamer) is a British website. It is for tabletop games. It has a focus on miniature wargames, tabletop role-playing games, and strategic card games. It creates articles on various PC Games. == References == == Other websites == * * Wargamer - Public Relations (archived version) Category:British websites
title: Wargamer (website)
